cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl
类 FileNameRuleImageUrl

java.lang.Object
  cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.FileNameRuleImageUrl
所有已实现的接口：
FileNameRule, java.io.Serializable
public class FileNameRuleImageUrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileNameRule

File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache

  • use image url as file name, replace char with _ if not letter or number
  • use file suffix in url as target file suffix
  • use setFileExtension(String) set file extension

另请参见：
序列化表格

字段摘要
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_FILE_NAME
          default file name if image url is empty
static int MAX_FILE_NAME_LENGTH
          max length of file name, not include suffix

          get file name, include suffix, it's optional to include folder.
